response.overview: Peter McCormick, a well-known author in the world of UFOs and alien abductions  gets the interview of a lifetime, Will Durham, the only known witness to the famous Martin alien abduction case recounts his true story of how his friend Alex Martin became one of the most legendary characters of UFO history.  For those who choose to believe this interview will change the face of UFO study for years to come.  The Disappearing  Dawn is an account of conspiracy and betrayal that will challenge  your  belief in an existence other than our own.
response.title: The Disappearing Dawn
